item.title: Leslie add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "The mountains are calling and I must go." -- John Muir

item.title: Leslie add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you, and the storms their energy, while cares will drop away from you like the leaves of Autumn." -- John Muir

item.title: Leslie add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "Thousands of tired, nerve-shaken, over-civilized people are beginning to find out going to the mountains is going home; that wilderness is a necessity..." -- John Muir

item.title: Leslie add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "In every walk with Nature one receives far more than he seeks." -- John Muir

item.title: Leslie add a quote by George Santayana
item.description: "The earth has music for those who listen." -- George Santayana

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Life is a journey, not a destination." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
